2025-07-31.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports organization policy for Customer Managed Encryption Keys (CMEK). For more information, see [CMEK organization policy](https://cloud.google.com/netapp/volumes/docs/configure-and-use/cmek/cmek-overview#cmek_organization_policy).

summary.title: New CMEK Organization Policy Support
summary.summary: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports organization policy for Customer Managed Encryption Keys (CMEK).

2025-07-29.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes is now integrated with NetApp BlueXP Connector. For more information, see [NetApp Volumes integration with BlueXP](https://cloud.google.com/netapp/volumes/docs/discover/features#netapp-volumes-integration-with-bluexp).

summary.title: NetApp BlueXP Connector Integration
summary.summary: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes is now integrated with NetApp BlueXP Connector.

2025-07-25.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports cross-project cross-region replication for Standard, Premium, and Extreme service levels. This feature is generally available for allow-listed users. For more information, see [About volume replication](https://cloud.google.com/netapp/volumes/docs/protect-data/about-volume-replication).

summary.title: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes Replication
summary.summary: Cross-project, cross-region replication for Google Cloud NetApp Volumes is now available.

2025-07-25.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports volume backups for large capacity volumes. This feature is now generally available. For more information, see [About backups](https://cloud.google.com/netapp/volumes/docs/protect-data/about-backups).

summary.title: New Feature: Volume Backups for Large Capacity Volumes
summary.summary: Volume backups for large capacity volumes are now available for Google Cloud NetApp Volumes.

2025-07-22.content: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports multi-VPC peering for all service levels. For more information, see [Connect additional networks](https://cloud.google.com/netapp/volumes/docs/get-started/quickstarts/connect-additional-networks).

summary.title: Multi-VPC Peering Support
summary.summary: Google Cloud NetApp Volumes now supports multi-VPC peering for all service levels.
